_header: Madame sith ye have entered the gates of policy
Subjects: Arthur, prince of Wales; Catherine of Aragon; pageant verses; occasional verse
_description: ‘The speche of Noblesse’ at the pageant celebrating the marriage of Prince Arthur and Princess Catharine — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: Madame sith ye haue entred the gates of pollycyAnd the presence approched of me noblesse…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …To come to honour therfore I shall provideThat vertue to honour shall be your guyde
BLCottVitAXVI.Attributed Title: The spech of Noblesse within the said Castell (f. 186v)
